Comments on fish health, location of hemorrhaging, type of predation scar, etc. Common locations on the fish that we refer to include the adipose fin (ADF), anal fin (ANF), caudal fin (CDF), pectoral fins (PCF), pelvic fins (PVF), dorsal fin (DF), snout, flank, caudal peducle, gill plate, and eye.
